statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, ticket_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE priority = 1;
SELECT customer_name, created_at FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, priority, created_at FROM CustomerSupportTickets ORDER BY priority DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, priority, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE priority > 2 ORDER BY priority DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' AND status IN ('Open', 'Processing') ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE priority = 1 ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND status NOT IN ('Resolved', 'Closed') ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_id = 1;
SELECT ticket_subject, status FROM Tickets WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT inquiry_id, inquiry_subject FROM Inquiries WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_description FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_id FROM Tickets WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT ticket_subject, status FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_id IN (1, 2, 3) OR status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM Tickets t INNER JOIN Inquiries i ON t.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE t.status = i.status;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_id > 1000;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM customer_support_tickets;
SELECT customer_name, creation_date FROM customer_support_tickets ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inquiries WHERE inquiry_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, resolution_details FROM resolved_tickets WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, issue_description FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(ticket_id) AS tickets_resolved FROM resolved_tickets GROUP BY customer_name ORDER BY tickets_resolved DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, issue_description, status FROM customer_support_tickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%software%' AND status = 'Open';
SELECT customer_name, inquiry_text, response_text FROM inquiries INNER JOIN resolved_tickets ON inquiries.customer_id = resolved_tickets.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, status FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id=2;
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolved_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tickets ORDER BY ticket_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, status FROM tickets WHERE status = 'Resolved';
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM inquiries JOIN customers ON inquiries.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status='Open';
SELECT agent_name, department FROM SupportAgents WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT ticket_id, status, updated_at FROM TicketHistory ORDER BY updated_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, customer_name, status FROM CustomerSupportTickets ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, issue_description FROM CustomerSupportTickets WHERE issue_description LIKE '%urgent%';

SELECT t.ticket_id, a.agent_name, t.assigned_at FROM TicketAssignments ta JOIN SupportAgents a ON ta.agent_id = a.agent_id JOIN CustomerSupportTickets t ON ta.ticket_id = t.ticket_id WHERE a.department = 'Technical Support';
SELECT t.ticket_id, t.status, h.status AS previous_status FROM CustomerSupportTickets t JOIN TicketHistory h ON t.ticket_id = h.ticket_id WHERE h.updated_at > '2022-01-01';
